trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There was one other sighting in Sacramento on or around October 13th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was filming the skies for anything out of the ordinary and at the western side of the base was a shiny object stationary in the sky so I took my camcorder to zoom up. Boy it was a good close up view but when using zoom lenses it cause the camera to become instable. I tried to hold on the camera for few seconds to get a good look on the object. After like 30 seconds or more I had to get the tripod so I could get a closer and steady view. I ran into my house and grap the tripod and out like 10 seconds. I looked up in the sky hoping it will remain there. I looked everywhere for it, it was gone in a flash. I am including my video for you to analysis and send me your professional opinion about my spaceship video.
Summary: Bullet shape lunar looking ship hovering near California Air Force Base
